item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: ridwan
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: ridwan
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost/Theme_maker.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: 7 Best Selling Hotel Themes With Online Booking In 2021
item.dc:creator: ridwan
item.content:encoded:
Finding the right hotel booking theme is quite difficult, but don't worry we have done the work for you. Bellow 7 best-selling hotel themes have been discussed.

Last of all the statistics of those hotel themes have been arranged on a table. We hope that this article will help you to choose the right theme for your hotel booking site.

Thinks that must have on a hotel booking theme

  • Online and offline payments.
  • booking calendars.
  • online search form.
  • email confirmations.
  • One click Demo import.
  • and many other useful functions that you will need while running a hotel booking website.

Buying Guide For Hotel Themes

There are 2 types of themes that you can choose for your hotel:

1 ) Themes that have been made only for hotel booking websites.

2 ) Multipurpose themes that you can use to build a hotel booking website.

If you want to buy a theme only for building a hotel website then you should choose a theme that is dedicated to hotel websites. On the other hand, if you want a versatile startup then you can go with a multipurpose WordPress theme.

Bellow's first 4 themes are dedicated to hotel booking sites and the last 3 of them are multipurpose themes.

Are you in hurry ?

If you are in hurry then check the Bellevue hotel theme.

1. Bellevue

  • Elementor - Intuitive Live Page Builder
  • Hotel & BnB Booking System ($138 value)
  • Premium Design for Hotels, BnBs, Rentals
  • 48+ Widgets, 50+ Page Templates, 8 Full Demos, Unlimited Design Options

Bellevue Theme has a built-in booking system and availability calendar and it's fully compatible with WooCommerce and WPML support is also included.

A custom version of WP Booking System ( value 34$ ) has been included, A Premium Version of Slider Revolution ($26 Value). Bundled for Free –A Premium Version of MasterSlider Responsive Touch Swipe Slider ($20 Value), and a Premium Version of Groovy Mega Menu ($35 Value) are included with the theme. So instead of buying the plugins individually buying the Bellevue Theme can be a good decision.

1000+ Icons, Parallax, Animations, Masonry blog feature. In addition, many other important features have been included.

Bellevue provides you with everything you will need to run a Hotel business. In short, Bellevue is a solid choice for Bed and Breakfast, Hotels Booking site at a very reasonable price.

Theme Info / Download
Live Demo

2. Traveler

  • Travel Agency Booking Online
  • Multivendor Travel Booking System
  • 400+ Flexible options in Theme options to help you make a dynamic system.
  • 15 Demos for all kind of Travel Websites

Traveler theme comes with a fully customizable booking form, flexible online payments, automated notifications, earning from Affiliate system, sync with Google Calendar, TripAdvisor Calendar, Airbnb Calendar, HomeAway Calendar, and even more!

Smart Search & Strong Filter: advanced search very easily to make searchable stronger. So with the strongly filterable booking list, you can make the layout user-friendly.

Checkout: The theme supports 12+ online payment Gateways. Of course, it allows you checkout with multi-items with many payment gateways supported by WooCommerce.

Other important features: 1 click importer, Responsive Modern Design, Megamenu, Communication via inbox, Retina ready, Email template, Multi-Lingual, Multi-currency Weather API, Support Location, Invoice Manage, Social login, OTA Calendar System and other such features. Those features will be helpful for you while running a hotel booking website.

Theme Info / Download
Live Demo

3. Book Your Travel

  • Booking & reservation system included
  • 24+ free website templates
  • Travel agency tour hotel & car rental booking
  • Easily sell travel packages & travel services
  • Admin panel can be adjusted according to your need.

This theme has 78+ payment gateway support. WooCommerce integration lets you use all of its payment gateways. Multilingual and Multi-currency support will help you to scale your hotel business.

Slider Revolution: Best premium slider on the market and it's all demo sliders are included ( save 27$ ). The latest WPBakery page builder is also included ( save 46$ ).

Megamenu: 11+ New headers and mega menus will let you create awesome-looking headers.

Search Box Designer: easily create your own search boxes to fit your content and business model. Even 100+ options to have full control over styling, typography, and content.

Child Theme Included: to ensure safe updates when customizations are needed.

Theme Info / Download
Live Demo

4. Soho Hotel

  • Hotel booking system
  • Online payments
  • Availability calendars & management

Soho Hotel is a hotel theme that comes with 6 homepage templates that are fully customizable. It has 4 available header types.

Nightly, Weekly, or Monthly Pricing: Charge different prices depending on the length of stay. 4 step Booking System, Flexible, and easy to use Booking Features.

Optional Extras: Allow guests to select optional extras such as airport transfers, breakfast, etc.

Checkout Payments: All bookings can be paid online using a credit card (via Stripe) or PayPal or alternatively pay in person with cash.

Booking Emails: Confirmation emails are sent to the website admin and guest when a new booking is placed.

Theme Info / Download
Live Demo

Multipurpose Themes

5. Kallyas

  • You get 70+ Pre-design Websites with Kallyas
  • Live Support + Best Support on the market
  • Monthly updates with new Designs & Features

Kallyas is a Creative Multipurpose WordPress theme with responsive, lightweight, drag & drop visual builder and no coding required.

Out of 70+ pre-built templates, Two of them are hotel demos that you can import with a single click to set up your hotel booking site.

Kallyas is Language friendly, So you can build a multilingual website with the help of WPML. It has 17 header layouts in the Mega Menu so you can create complex dropdown menus visually. Also, you can create unlimited Footers with the Footer Builder.

Revolution Slider 6: The best Slider Builder included for free. Lots of other features are also included with Kallyas.

In short, Kallyas is really a Gigantic WordPress Toolbox for building beautiful websites.

Theme Info / Download
Live Demo

6. Kalium

  • #1 Creative Theme on the Market
  • High Quality Templates & Regular Updates
  • Unlimited customization with Elementor & WPBakery.

Kalium is a super fast and well-optimized theme. The theme is SEO Optimized so that you can rank on Google even higher.

Premium Plugins that come bundled with the theme are ( WPBakery Page Builder, Product Size Guide, Revolution Slider, Layer Slider & ACF Pro ) So use the theme and show your creativity.

Compatible with WPML. In fact, Kalium is already translated in 18+ languages. The theme also has full support for RTL ( Right To Left ) Languages.

5-star support is ready to listen to your issue and give solutions.

A multipurpose theme as Kalium gives you a lot of flexibility to create the ideal hotel booking website. Similarly, The features that come with the Theme make it an excellent choice for any Hospitality related website.

Theme Info / Download
Live Demo

7. TheGem

  • 400+ ready-to-use creative templates
  • Most beautiful fastest multi-purpose theme
  • Unlimited customization. Elementor & amp; WPBakery

Although TheGem is a multipurpose theme it doesn't compromise with quality. As a result, it's one of the best-selling themes in ThemeForest.

Lightweight and super fast. Perfect SEO-friendly code ensures high google rankings. Fully responsive 100% retina ready. Looks great & crisp sharp on any device and screen.

premium sliders are included ( save 37$ ). Fully compatible with contact form 7, Mailchimp, Yoast SEO, Total Cache, Events Calendar, and much more! So you should not face any compatibility issues.

60+ elements in 250+ styles, 400+ Demos 3 of them for hotel website. All Demo websites & pages can be easily mixed to make your unique design. Multilingual and RTL (Right To Left) languages ready, therefore easily translate into any language, and if you face any problem 5-star support is ready to give you a solution.

Though there are missing features such as the ability to take bookings and an availability calendar. However, these features can be easily added using plugins.

Although it does not offer you all the functionality you need for a hotel website. TheGem does offer an attractive and versatile starting point for your hotel website.

Theme Info / Download
Live Demo

Which Is The Best Hotel Booking Theme ?

So which of these 7 hotel themes should you choose? Well, here’s how the scores stack up :

If You want to use the Elementor page builder then you can choose one of the below themes for hotels. Those themes are Compatible With Elementor and Elementor Pro page builder.

  • Bellevue
  • Book Your Travel
  • Kalium
  • TheGem

item.title: Betheme | The Biggest WordPress Multipurpose Theme Review - 2021
item.dc:creator: ridwan
item.content:encoded:
BeTheme is a Multipurpose WordPress theme that helps you build any type of website within a blink of an eye. It comes with a huge collection of demos, features, premium plugins, and much more.

You may have tried many multipurpose themes before but this one is different from all other multipurpose WordPress themes. It's something more than just another WordPress theme, This theme can easily adapt to any project you may need to work with. and you don't need to have any coding skeel to work with it.

Betheme Pros & Cons

Pros

Cons

  • 100% SEO optimized
  • Superfast
  • 600+ ready-to-use prebuild websites
  • Muffin Builder and WPBakery page builder included
  • Fully compatible with Elementor
  • Mobile-friendly design
  • 5-star support system
  • It's a little bit complicated to use the theme because of its vast range of options
  • Only one license per domain

Is Betheme value for money?

Betheme is one of the Bestselling multipurpose WordPress themes available in the Envato market. Envato BeTheme has over 600 demos, lots of features & premium plugins so Purchasing a premium theme like this one will be a great choice when it comes to building a stunning website. With the prebuild demos you can build any type of website within a second.

If you are a creative person then you might want to add your own touch to all the premade demos. Well, that's why the developers have included two-page builder plugins to give you full power to show your creativity.

Does Elementor work with Betheme?

Elementor 100% perfectly works with Betheme. All though Betheme comes with Muffin builder and WPBakery page builder it does not have any compatibility issues with the Elementor page builder. Not only Elementor but Betheme is also fully compatible with all your favorite plugins. In spite of that if you face any issue with the theme you can contact to there support and they will help you to resolve your problem.

Plugins included with BeTheme

By purchasing the theme you can save 174$ with already included plugins, To clarify you will get three premium plugins with Betheme that are WPBakery page builder, Slider Revolution, and Layer Slider. If you want to buy them individually that will cost you around 174$. It will be a good decision to buy a theme like Betheme from Envato that comes with premium plugins rather than buying plugins one by one.

Betheme is compatible with all modern plugins

Customize your website with all your favorite plugins without any compatibility issues.

Is Betheme SEO friendly?

Search Engine Optimization is the crucial part of a website to rank on Google. Betheme is an SEO-friendly theme that can help you to rank your website even higher because it is fully compatible with famous SEO plugins like Yoast SEO and All in One SEO.

why choose Betheme?

If you want a versatile startup then you should definitely go with a multipurpose WordPress theme. BeTheme can be the partner of your journey thus it has a vast range of features. Some of Its important features are below:

  • Multilingual and RTL ready : Bethme comes with built-in translator that allows you to translate directly from Muffin Options.  (WPML plugin is not included) but if you want to use WPML to create multilingual website you can do that , It also have RTL ( Right To Left ) support , so you don't have to warry about it.
  • WooCommerce support : You can create your own e-commerce store with Betheme.
  • Speed Optimizatuin :  Well-written code and optimized images  ensure the super fast loding speed of your site. Therefore your visitors will love how fast your website is.
  • 600+ ready-to-use prebuild websites : Purchasing The theme you will get current 600+ demo and also grants access to future demos.
  • 1 click installation : Installing a demo is no fer a hassale . within a click your site will be ready to use.
  • Cross browser compatible : Betheme is compatible with Firefox, Safari, Opera, Chrome, Edge
  • Clean Coded
  • Built-in Mega Menu
  • Over 300 vector icons included
  • 600+ Google Fonts
  • 4 different grid layouts: 1240px Full Width, 960px Full Width 1240px Boxed, 960px Boxed.
  • 18 + predefined header layouts : Predefefined headers can be used with all the layouts. You can arrange the header with logo and menu as you want. similarly you can change colors, use fonts, upload a logo or adjust sizes.
  • Free premium plugins : you will get WPBakery page builder, Slider Revolution, and Layer Slider premiums attached with the theme.
  • 200+ Shortcodes : Over 200 Muffin Builder and shortcodes items included.
  • Child theme : Child theme is allredy included in the package . Just install it and enjoy endless customizations.
  • Responsive & Retina ready : Betheme is fully Responsive and Retina ready that will display high-resolution images on devices .For instance Your vesitors will love the way it looks on verious devices.
  • Parallax effect & video background : Create gorgious looking and modern pages with the smooth parallax effect . Upload videos, images, graphical elements and create an eye catching website.
  • Unlimited Color options : Every element of the demo can be changed With the built-in color pickers .

In addition, many other features are included with the theme.

Demos

Betheme has 600+ prebuild demos. The index of the demos is below.

Conclusion

To sum up, BeTheme has all the features you would expect to get in a premium WordPress theme. The collection of demos, features, and customization options make it a great choice for any type of website.

The huge selection of 600+ demo websites is highly impressive. Therefore, this theme makes a great choice for those who want a versatile startup. And also for web developers who want to create multiple websites for their clients.

However, if you are a beginner or want to create just one website for your business or want to build your client's website with this theme, it is still a perfect choice. Thanks to the two drag and drop page builders that increased the possibility of showing your creativity.

So last of all, we can say that BeTheme is perfect for building any type of website.

item.title: TheGem Theme Review (2021) - Creative Multipurpose & WooCommerce Theme
item.dc:creator: Korim
item.content:encoded:
In this TheGem WordPress theme review, I will explore everything that’s included in the TheGem theme package. The goal here is to help you decide whether is this the right tool for you or not.

TheGem is one of the most trending and powerful multipurpose WordPress themes in ThemeForest. The theme has a versatile range of demos, premium plugins, page builders, a wide range of features, and many more!

If you’re looking for a theme that can be used to build a wide range of websites, so you should definitely read the article to find out if this is the right option in our TheGem theme review.

Pros

Cons

  • 400+ creative templates
  • Useful premium plugins
  • Woocommerce Integration
  • Mighty user friendly admin
  • Compitable with Elementor, WPBakery & visual composer page builder
  • Lots of competition from other multi-purpose themes
  • WordPress designer lack of assistance

Is TheGem Theme value for money?


If you look at the best-selling themes available today in Themeforest. You will
notice that the best-selling and most popular themes are multipurpose themes.
That means you can build almost any type of website with those themes.
Thus TheGem is also this type of multipurpose WordPress theme. So it can be a suitable theme for almost any project.

Page Builders

Two theme versions are included in one package. No need to buy Elementor Pro separately, SAVE $49/year. In the same way, SAVE $64! with already Included WPBakery page builder.

You can do unlimited customization with Elementor & WPBakery page builder. You can choose between the Pagebuilder which one you would like to use, WP Bakery PageBuilder or Elementor.

Having those Two-page builder integrated with the theme will save your lot of money and gives you the freedom to work with you, favorite page builder.

Premium Sliders

TheGem theme also includes two premium slider plugins that are Revolution Slider and LayerSlider. Both of them are advanced tools so you can create advanced slideshows and presentations for your website.

If you go to buy them individually they will cost you around ( 26$ + 25$ ) = 51$. So you can buy the theme instead of buying them individually and have the

Revolution Slider:  It's probably one of the best slider plugins on market! With tons of crazy options, effects & unlimited possibilities. It has device friendly responsive design. Insert any media in any number of layers, combine it and impress your visitors.

Layer Slider: It is the ultimate solution for creating beautiful animations, breathtaking designs, and rich content. It comes with more than 200 preset 2D and 3D slide transitions. which are fully responsive to look good on various devices. Layer Slider comes with TheGem as a fully integrated slider plugin!  

10 Reasons To Buy TheGem

1) Mobile & Retina ready: Responsive and 100% Retina ready, that ensures a great looking design on any device.

2) SEO: Perfect SEO-friendly code that helps you to rank on Google much higher.

3) High Performance: Superfast & Lightweight, Made for height performance

4) WPBakery Page Builder: Save 34$ with already included premium drag and drop WPBakery page builder.

5) Premium Sliders: Save 37$ with the already included best premium slider on the market ( Slider Revolution & LayerSlider ).

6) Plugins Ready: Fully compatible with Mailchimp, Yoast SEO, Total Cache, Contact Form 7, Visual Composer Events Calendar & much more.

7) Endless Creativity: 90+ pre-made creative websites and 400 demo pages which are easily customizable with 250+ styles. So that You can easily adjust anything according to your need.

8) Online Store: 100% compatible with WooCommerce. Awesome design and boosting features for setting up an online shop.

8) Multilingual & RTL: Easily translatable into any language with WPML, RF, ES, DE, RU packs included. RTL (Right To Left ) languages ready.

10) EN, DE, RU, PL Support: Best-rated support on ThemeForest. With over 5 years of experience.

Pre Build Demos


If you look at the demos provided by TheGem multipurpose theme, You will see that it has 400+ ready–to–use creative templates. It has almost every category of demos available in its demo section.

All templates are well optimized so you don’t need to work manually to optimize them. Within just one click your site will be installed and ready to use. However, You can use a page builder like Visual Composer, Elementor & WPBakery to customize those pages according to your need.

TheGem Blocks

TheGem Blocks is a free plugin, bundled with TheGem. Over 395 pre-made blocks are available in the Blocks section. Here you will find all pre-made blocks that you can use to speed up your website building process. Therefore You can easily create good-looking unique designs by using those blocks.

For beginners: those blocks can be a perfect starting point to implement their own layout ideas. To build websites faster, just insert the block you like & replace the text and your design will be ready to use.

For professionals: quick A/B layouts to present your clients. Well optimized for best performance and fast working. Believe me, those blocks can save a lot of effort.

TheGem Features

Without writing a single line of code you can show your creativity by using the features provided by the theme. So don't waste your time on coding, enjoy your creativity!

Online Shop Demos with Ecommerce Capabilities


Setting up an online shop with WordPress is totally free and easy. After installing WordPress and choosing a suitable e-commerce plugin like WooCommerce, the final task is choosing an appropriate theme.
And yes you are in the right place, TheGem provides plenty of solutions in this portion. In fact, TheGem has four e-commerce demos to choose from. Even if you don't want to start with a demo, Don't worry the other concepts are fully e-commerce supported.

Pricing Delails Of TheGem Theme

TheGem theme's regular price is 59$ but now you can get the theme only for 41$ from the link below. you will get 6 months of free support with the theme. However, if you wish to increase the support duration you can do that by paying an extra 10.88$.

Note: You will get all the premium plugins that are included with the theme and lifetime free updates of the theme.

Conclusion

If you take a closer look at the theme you will notice that having page builder compatibility is a major advantage. Having compatibility with Visual Composer, Elementor, and WPBakery page builder can be a major factor behind choosing the theme.

Even With a good selection of pre-built website demos, TheGem is a great value theme.

It has an impressive design, powerful features, and endless customization options. Therefore, no matter what type of website you’re planning to build, there’s a good chance that TheGem can help you build your desired website.

item.title: Review Of HostGator (2021) Pros & Cons + Performance
item.dc:creator: ridwan
item.content:encoded:
Are you trying to find out if HostGator is best for you or if there are any, better, web hosting plans for you? If yes, Then you are in the right place!

In this review of Hostgator web hosting plans, we will discuss HostGator's pros & cons. The different hosting plans and which plan is for whom. We will explain HostGator important features and a lot more.

Pros and Cons of HostGator Hostings

Pros

  • Affordable shared hosting
  • Free domain & Free SSL
  • Amazing features
  • Reliable uptime and fast response times
  • No restriction on bandwidth, emails & disk space
  • Free Gator website builder
  • A great C-panel
  • Solid security
  • Free website migration
  • 45-days money back gurantee
  • Good for beginners

Cons

  • Higher monthly pricing
  • Aggressive upselling
  • Not all Services are Refundable

HostGator Performance - 99.9% uptime

HostGator promises to have a 99.90% uptime guarantee.

In their uptime guarantee they said that, If their shared or reseller hosting server falls down from the 99.90% uptime guarantee, they will provide you one (1) month of free credit on your hosting plan.

The above guarantee is a little bit different for VPS and Dedicated Servers hosting. In their Network Guarantee, they mentioned that for this type of hosting the credit is prorated for the amount of time the server is down.

From most of the other user's experiences, we can say that you will probably see a 99.95% average uptime from their hosting.

HostGator Speed Test

HostGator has an average Load Time of around 700-800 ms.

We know this is not the best loading time but it is also not so bad. If you are a beginner or you're running a small website, then you are probably not going to see any impact because of this average loading time.

Here we have mentioned Shared hosting. The loading time may vary depending on various things such as which hosting plan you have chosen, From where you are requesting for the web page, How many resources you are using, etc.

A study from Google found that a one-second delay in mobile page load times can have up to 20% impact on conversion rates.

So if you wish to have a much faster loading speed you will have to choose a higher plan.

Built-in Website Builder

You can easily create a stunning website, using their Gator Website Builder. There are 100+ mobile-friendly templates. In addition, build using the convenient drag & drop Gator builder. pre-built sections and pages will reduce your lot of effort. Those prebuild sections and pages will inspire your web design. with the builder, you will have 6 ready-made pages to start with.

HostGator Hosting Plans

HostGator is one of the largest and most popular Web hosting providers. Like other hosting Companies they also offer shared hosting, WordPress hosting, VPS hosting, dedicated servers, and reseller hosting plans.

1) Shared hosting

Shared hosting is the type of hosting where multiple websites are hosted on the same server. They share resources and other services with each other. This type of hosting is for startups that don't need many resources for their site.

HostGator comes with 3 variations of shared hosting plans. Three of them have unlimited storage and unlimited bandwidth under their terms of use. The main difference between them is the number of websites you can host.

Some of the other mentionable features are HostGator Website Builder to build simple websites by yourself. Free website and domain transfer, not all hostings provide this for free. $150 Google Ads credit & $100 Microsoft Advertising credit.

Most importantly you will gate 45-day money-back guarantee so you can definitely test their service without any hesitation.

2) Wordpress hosting

WordPress hosting is nothing but web hosting that is optimized to run WordPress sites. With this type of hosting, you may receive some tools and services that are specifically tailored to WordPress sites.

HostGator offers three variations of pre-installed, managed WordPress web hosting:

  • Starter ( $5.95/mo* )
  • Standard ( $7.95/mo* )
  • Business ( $9.95/mo* )

The differences between the three hostings are the number of websites you can host on them. You can host 1, 2, and 3 websites respectively to the hostings plans.

With the starter plan, you can handle 100k users and with the other two plans, you can handle 200k and 300k users respectively.

You will be able to install WordPress on those hostings within just one click. Hundreds of themes are available with the hosting plans. No need to mention website migration is 100% free.

Those plans come with some other important features that are Free Domain, Free SSL, Free Email, Unmetered Bandwidth, $150 Google Ads credit, Backups, Security, and much more.

3) VPS hosting

VPS Hosting is used for higher performance than shared hosting. It simulates the experience of a dedicated server even though you will be still sharing the physical server with other users. You will get a good quality performance from it.

HostGator comes with three Linux-based VPS hosting plans. If you are having high traffic volumes or expecting to have and need more CPU power, RAM, Storage, etc. But you don't want to pay for a dedicated server, these are good options to consider.

HostGator pricing for VPS hosting is as follow:

  • Snappy 2000 ( $19.95/mo* )
  • Snappy 4000 ( $29.95/mo* )
  • Snappy 8000 ( $39.95/mo* )

The most basic plan offers 2GB RAM and the other two plan has 4GB and 8GB RAM respectively. In the matter of storage, they offer 120GB, 165GB, and 24GB SSD space.

The first two plans offer 2core vCPU and the last one Shappy 8000 offers 4cores vCPUs.

All of these plans have 2 Dedicated IPs, Unmetered Bandwidth, Unlimited Emails, Centralized DDoS Protection, US-based Data Center, Premium support, and a lot more.

So if you want more performance than shared hosting and don't want to pay for a Dedicated server then you can go with a VPS hosting plan.

HostGator pricing Comparison

We know HostGator pricing is not the lowest pricing hosting, Hostinger provides hosting at in much lower price but HostGator is also a value for money choice.

HostGator Customer Support

In the matter of customer support, HostGator is among the best. Very few hosting companies can compete with their customer service. They even have awards to prove this fact.

HostGator has a giant database with common questions that may help beginners a lot. If you don't find the answer to your question in their knowledge base, you can contact their support team via phone, email, and live chat.

They also have social media support on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, more than 680 helpful articles on their website, and 500+ tutorials to help you with almost anything related to HostGator. They even have a forum where you can ask questions and answer questions asked by others.

Alternatively, if you are facing an issue that needs special attention, their customer support representatives are available 24/7/365 to assist you with whatever questions you may have.

FAQs About HostGator Hosting

Who is HostGator Best For?

HostGator can be a great choice for entry-level beginners who are searching for a low barrier to entry hosting service. If you’re looking for one of the easiest and affordable hosting services to help you get your site up and running, HostGator is a great place to start. 

Who is better than HostGator?

When it comes to the matter of security Bluehost is slightly better than HostGator. On the other hand, HostinGer provides hosting at the cheapest price.

What is the cost of renewing a domain name?

Domain name prices usually increase after the first year. The average renewal price for a .com domain may cost you around $8.27 to $29.99 / year. If you want to lock in a price on your chosen domain name, you can purchase it for multiple years.

Conclusion

In this HostGator review article, we have seen all the advantages and disadvantages of choosing Hostgator web hosting.

To sum up, HostGator can be a great choice for those who are looking for a simple, cheap shared hosting solution.

For those who are looking for little more features, I will recommend HostGator's cloud hosting plan.

Their WordPress hosting plans can be a good choice for WordPress users as they give you the speed and security you need without the high price tag.

Over 2 million customers have already trusted on HostGator service. So if you are searching for your dream hosting plan. I think testing by yourself will be the right decision. As they offer you a 45-day money-back guarantee you can get a refund if you don't like their service. But I don't think that you will have to refund as they are one of the best hosting providers available in the market.

Visit HostGator

item.content:encoded: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

item.title: Simple Review Of Bluehost - Good and Bad side in 2021
item.dc:creator: Korim
item.content:encoded:
Did you know that over 2 million websites are already hosted on Bluehost?

Bluehost is one of the biggest web hosting companies in the world and it's also recommended by WordPress. They offer a wide variety of hosting plans that can be suitable for any type of website. See the complete review of Bluehost to find out if it is the right choice for your website.

In this Bluehost review, we are going to cover the following areas :

  • Pros & cons: What are the posative and nagative side of Bluehost hosting plan?
  • Uptime:  Will your website face any downtime?
  • Server Resposne Time: How much fast is their server?
  • Hosting plans: What types of hosting plans does Bluehost offer?
  • Customer Support:  Is their customer support available 24/7 to help you resolve your problem?
  • Conclusion:  Is Bluehost a good choice for you?
  • FAQ:  Some Frequently Asked Question to help you take the right decision.

Pros and Cons of Bluehost Hostings

Pros

  • Starts from ($2.75/mo)
  • Free Domain & Free SSL
  • Free CDN Included
  • No hidden charges
  • Unmetered bandwidth
  • Free site migration
  • Easy-to-use interface
  • Useful WordPress site-building software
  • Recommended by WordPress
  • 30-Day money back gurantee

Cons

  • Higher domain renewal price
  • Upselling Addons
  • Lacks cloud hosting
  • No monthly shared hosting plans
  • Lack Windows-based servers

Bluehost Performance

Basically, the performance of hosting is measured depending upon 2 major matrices which are Uptime and Loading speed.

Uptime

Uptime is the time that a website or web service is available to the users in a given time period. It's one of the major things that you should look for while choosing a hosting service.

Believe it or not, no hosting company can provide 100% uptime always. So which hosting company provides more than 99.95% uptime we will consider it as a good quality uptime.

We have found that on average Bluehost provides around 99.98% uptime. Which is good quality uptime. Most of the time you may see an uptime of around 99.99%, sometimes it may fall down a little which happens with other hostings also.

Choosing a hosting with good uptime is too much important for your site. If it goes down you may lose your visitors. So You should always go with a hosting service that has more than 99.95% uptime.

Bluehost Server Resposne Time

Right after uptime, page loading time is the second most important thing that you should look for while choosing a hosting service.

If you are testing a live website speed using some tools, you are basically seeing how everything on that website loads. This includes images and videos too, which take a much longer time to load.

Page loading time may vary depending upon your website content and from where your visitors are requesting for the web page.

To make it simple, we have tested only the server response time without loading any content. you are probably gonna see an average server response time as we have shown below.

We can see that the Bluehost server in the US loads much faster than in other locations. So If your targeted audience is from the United States, then this would benefit your website.

WordPress.org Recommended Host

WordPress is the most popular CMS in the world. Millions of bloggers, business owners, and publishers use WordPress to build their websites. Around 44% of the internet is built with WordPress.

Bluehost is one of the 3 hostings that is recommended by WordPress. The recommended hostings are :

  1. Bluehost
  2. Dreamhost
  3. SiteGround

Thus Bluehost is recommended by WordPress so there should be no doubt that it's one of the best hosting providers available in the market.

Bluehost Hosting Plans

Bluehost is one of the largest and most popular Web hosting providers. They offer shared hosting, Managed WordPress hosting, VPS hosting, Dedicated servers, and reseller hosting plans.

1) Shared hosting

Shared hosting is a good option for those who don't expect much traffic to their website. In this type of hosting you will be sharing server resources with others. The positive side of this type of hosting is it's too cheap compared to other types of hosting plans.

Their shared hosting can be a choice for beginners to host their website. In shared hosting, the features offered by Bluehost are as follows.

2) Managed WordPress Hosting

In a managed WordPress hosting account, the hosting company handles all tasks related to keeping the WordPress website up and running smoothly.

They install any recommended security updates for your theme and plugins. They also make sure that spam filters and firewalls are installed and working properly.

In a managed WordPress hosting like this one, the host also takes care of regular backing up the site and installing regular updates to WordPress itself. They also update the site’s theme and plugins. They even troubleshoot any problems with connectivity and uptime.

If you are going to build your site on WordPress and don't want to Handle Site Maintenance by your self then WordPress managed hosting plan can be a good choice for you.

3) VPS hostings

If you want to have an experience of using a dedicated server but don't want to pay such a huge amount for it. Then VPS server is the choice for you.

In this VPS hosting your server resources are yours alone, and every plan comes with the CPU, RAM, and storage to get the job done.

There will be no limits on the amount of traffic to your VPS hosting plan. Bluehost provides all virtual private servers with high-performance SSD storage.

The pricing comparison of VPS hosting is as follows:

Bluehost Customer Support

Support is one of the major things that you should carefully look for while choosing a hosting plan. Because it's the thing that is gonna help you when you face any problem with your hosting.

Bluehost provides 24/7 customer support over the phone, live chat, and have an email ticketing system.

They also maintain a huge library of articles, video tutorials, and step-by-step guides as part of their knowledge base. This is truly helpful for beginners and most common issues can be quickly resolved by a simple search.

It is too important that you choose a web hosting provider that offers help and support when you need it.

Conclusion

After reading this review of Bluehost, you might be wondering if Bluehost is the right choice for you?

We often see that many websites rank Bluehost as the number 1 hosting service. They provide every type of hosting plan that you may need to start with.

Bluehost has been recommended by WordPress.org since 2005 and is one of the most integrated services for building WordPress websites. So if you are planning to build your website on WordPress then Bluehost can be a great option to start with.

Not only for WordPress sites, but their other hosting plans are also value for money. Thus they give you a 30-day money-back guarantee you can test their service by yourself. And we think you are not gonna disappoint with their service.

Visit HostGator

FAQs About Bluehost Hosting

1. Can Bluehost handle high traffic?

Bluehost offers unmetered bandwidth, which means you will have a set amount of bandwidth, but you will be able to transfer as much data as you want within that rate. 

2. Where are Bluehost servers located?

Bluehost’s main Datacenter is located in the USA. The exact location is ( Provo, Utah, USA & Orem, Utah, USA ). Their Indian Datacenter is in Mumbai. Their other data centers are London Data Center, Hong Kong China Datacenter, Shanghai China datacenter.

3. What Bluehost plan should I get?

If you are a beginner you can start with the shared hosting basic or plus plan. If you are planning to build your site on WordPress and don't want to take too much hassle then you can go with their Managed WordPress hosting. On the other hand, if you are running a big website and it uses too many resources then you should choose their VPS or Dedicated server.

item.title: Simple Review Of Siteground - Good and Bad side in 2022
item.dc:creator: ridwan
item.content:encoded:
Did you know that 2,800,000 websites are already hosted on SiteGround?

SiteGround is one of the biggest web hosting companies in the world and they are also recommended by WordPress. They offer a wide variety of hosting plans that can be suitable for any type of website. See the complete review of SiteGround to find out if it is the right choice for your website.

In this SiteGround review, we are going to cover the following areas :

  • Pros & cons: What are the posative and nagative side of SiteGround hosting plan?
  • Uptime:  Will your website face any downtime?
  • Server Resposne Time: How much fast is their server?
  • Hosting plans: What types of hosting plans does SiteGround offer?
  • Customer Support:  Is their customer support available 24/7 to help you resolve your problem?
  • Conclusion:  Is SiteGround a good choice for you?
  • FAQ:  Some Frequently Asked Question to help you take the right decision.

Pros and Cons of SiteGround Hostings

Pros

  • Free CDN and SSL
  • Excellent uptime
  • Unlimited traffic
  • Excellent customer support
  • High-speed hosting
  • Quick server response times all over the world!
  • 6 datacenters in 4 continents
  • Free daily backups and restores with all plans
  • User-friendly custom dashboard

Cons

  • No free domain
  • Limited Storage
  • Renewal price is high

SiteGround Performance

Basically, the performance of hosting is measured depending upon 2 major matrices which are Uptime and Loading speed. Which is measured below.

Uptime Guarantee 99.9%

SiteGround has a 99.9% uptime guarantee. They give you a credit if they don't reach 99.9% uptime. It means if their uptime drops below 99.9%, You will get a month of free hosting. Plus, they'll give you an extra month of free service for every 1% downtime that is less than 99.9%.

Such a powerful uptime website makes visitors happy. The more important thing is that your site is guaranteed to be up and running around the clock so you don't miss out when your customers want to shop.

Last year we have seen a 99.99% uptime on SiteGround. Which is nearly perfect. From our research and experience, we can say that on average you will always see an uptime above 99.97%.

SiteGround Server Resposne Time

The second most important thing after Uptime is Loading speed. If the loading speed of your site is not fast you will lose a lot of traffic.

Server response time and the loading speed of your site are not the same things. Server response time is the time which server takes to respond when someone clicks to open your website. And page loading speed depends on various things such as Server response time, website size, images, videos that you have used on your site.

Although loading speed depends on lots of things but Server response time is the major part.

So while choosing a hosting for your website you should definitely check their server response time because it's the main thing that can give your visitors a fast page loading experience.

From our research, we have found SiteGround as a fast-loading hosting service. We know it's not the fastest hosting service out there but it will be quite enough for giving your visitors a fast-loading experience.

In fact, you won’t need to worry about the loading speed. They claim that they load your website 4x faster than other hosts, so you won’t have to worry about losing visitors for slow loading time.

Recommended By Wordpress

WordPress is the most popular CMS all over the world. Millions of bloggers, business owners, and publishers use WordPress to build websites. Around 44% of the internet is built with WordPress.

SiteGround is one of the 3 hostings providers that is recommended by WordPress. The recommended hostings are :

  1. SiteGround
  2. Bluehost
  3. Dreamhost

Thus SiteGround has been recommended by WordPress so there should be no doubt that it’s one of the best hosting providers available in the market.

SiteGround Hosting Plans

SiteGround is one of the largest and most popular Web hosting providers. They offer shared hosting, Managed WordPress hosting, Managed WooCommerce hosting, Cloud hosting, and reseller hosting plans.

The pricing of Shared, WordPress, and WooCommerce hosting is the same, the differences are only in the use cases and some features that are simply explained below.

1) Shared hosting

In SiteGround Shared hosting plan you have 3 different choices. In the startup plan, you will have 10GB storage with 10,000 Monthly visits and you can host only one website. In GrowBig and GoGeek plans you can host unlimited websites and the allowed storage will be 20GB and 40GB respectively. The number of monthly visits will be 1 lakh and 4 lakh respectively.

Without these 3 features, all other features on the 3 plans are the same.

You might be thinking this shared hosting plan will be perfect in which situation?

Here is the answer, if you are just starting a new website and you are not going to use WordPress to build your website then you can go with their shared hosting plan. And if you are considering WordPress to build your website then their managed WordPress hosting will be a perfect choice for you.

2) Managed WordPress Hosting

Managed WordPress hosting means they will keep updating your WordPress site, Plugins, and security system. If you forget to keep track of the new releases, their automatic WordPress software, and plugin updates are for you.  Even you can skip a version if you need more time to prepare for the update.

You can see that the Price of the shared hosting plan and Managed WordPress hosting plan are the same but there is some difference between them. On WordPress hosting plan you can only host websites that are built by using WordPress.

On Managed WordPress hosting plan you are getting some extra features than the shared plan and the extra features are:

  • Free WP installation
  • Free WP migration
  • Wordpress auto updates

So if you are planning to build a website on WordPress you should go with a Managed hosting plan and SiteGround Managed WordPress hosting plan is one of the best choices. They offer almost everything that you may need to run a WordPress site.

3) Managed WooCommerce Hosting

WooCommerce hosting is the same thing as WordPress hosting but here they have set up the environment for an online store so that you don't have to take any hassle. You just go and upload your product directly.

With WooCommerce you can sell any type of digital or physical product and service to your customers. By setting up an online store you can scale your business faster than a physical store. You just have to do the extra work that is to ship the product. By doing so your business is probably going to have a boost up. You will be selling products while you are sleeping because all works are automated. people will be able to select, purchase and give you pay online. Your task is only to ship the product and maintain the system.

Thus on SiteGround Managed WooCommerce hosting plan, you are getting the environment pre-setup for you to start an online store. This is going to save you a lot of effort.

SiteGround Customer Support

SiteGround provide 24/7/365 customer support over the phone, live chat, and ticket-based email support. They almost instantly respond over the phone and live chat support. On Email-based ticket support, you may get a response in less than 10 minutes.

SiteGround also offers a huge collection of knowledge base articles with screenshots, videos, tutorials, and guides. So that you can fix your issue by yourself.

SiteGround says its main focus is on customer service, So you are not going to see any latency on customer support.

Conclusio

SiteGround providing a solid uptime for the last few years. And their 99.9% uptime guarantee makes sure that you are probably not going to have any major downtime issues with their hosting.

Their loading speed is also quite good so your visitors are going to have a fast loading experience on their hosting.

Their customer support is good enough to give you support when you need it. And they are recommended by WordPress.

So considering all the things we can say that you are going to have a great experience with their hosting service. And you will not regrate for this decision.

Just remember one thing that their renewal price is a little high so you should choose a plan for a longer time.

Visit SiteGround

FAQs On SiteGround Hosting

1. Best SiteGround Alternatives?

SiteGround is one of the best hosting providers that will impress you. However here are some SiteGround alternatives:
# Bluehost
#HostGator
#DreamHost
#InMotion

2. Is Bluehost better than SiteGround?

SiteGround and Bluehost both offer the same features, but SiteGround has significantly improved its hosting technology.

When it comes to overall performance, technology infrastructure, and support quality, obviously SiteGround is better than Bluehost. However, SiteGround has increased pricing by 2x with all this innovation.

So when it comes to pricing, Bluehost is better than SiteGround because it offers hostings 50% cheaper than SiteGround and they also offer a free domain name with each hosting plan.

3. Which SiteGround plan should I choose?

Well if you are just starting a website you can go with their basic plan and if you are going to build a website on WordPress then you can go with the managed WordPress hosting plan. The GroBig plan can be a good choice for you.
On the other hand, if you are going to set up an online store you can choose the Woocomerce plan.
